name: export-svg-chart
description: Converts SVG+CSS charts built with front-end technologies like D3 into SVG/PNG Node buffers for server-side use.
author: Thibaud Colas <thib@thib.me> (https://github.com/thibaudcolas)

scripts.test: node examples/basic.js && wc -c basic-example.png && wc -c basic-example.svg && cat basic-example.svg
